main: ^Hi Jake, sure is hot today, huh?
^Too bad I forgot my hat at the farm.
^Now I have to sweat like a racing rabbit.
^But enough about me, what are you doing?
^I am searching for a good gift for a girl.
^Well, if i can help you with something let me know.
got_hat_real: ^Hi Jake, sure is hot today, huh?
^Too bad I forgot my hat at the farm.
^I got you this hat to help you with this sun.
^Thank you so much, you saved my head.
^If you still searching for a gift for the girl you can bring her this juicy carrots.
^You know what they say: "Love goes first through the stomach, than the heart".
^Thank you so much, now I have the perfect gift for her!
already_done: ^You can never go wrong with a bunch of carrots.
